title: The combat on plastic straws, plastic bottles, and plastic ... - Reddit
body: The combat on plastic straws, plastic bottles, and plastic bags is not blown our of proportion, but it is covering up the high use of plastic by big retailers. I work at a retailer known for it having a bullseye. Every day copious amounts of product comes in boxes that contain at least 1 plastic bag per item, sometimes the items will be bagged ...
